history.narrative: Law 17-176, the “Compliance Unit Establishment Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-503 which was referred to the Committee on Economic Development. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on March 4, 2008, and April 1, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on April 22, 2008, it was assigned Act No. 17-360 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-176 became effective on June 13, 2008.
